Online Inventory Management To Help You Take Control Of Your Business

## Table of contents

- [General info](#general-info)

## General info

Users can mange their invntory, inovices, shipping status and sale performace with this platform.

## Technologies

Project is created with:

- rails version: 4.2.4
- pg version: 0.18

## Setup

To run this project, install it locally using npm:

```
$ cd ../invntory
& bundle install
$ rake db:migrate
$ rails s
```
